text: Paul Gladstone Chandler (November 7, 1889 – August 8, 1986) was a college president and an American football, basketball and baseball coach. He served as the head football coach (1920–1922), head men's basketball coach (1920–1923) and head baseball coach (1922) at Kent State University in Kent, Ohio. He served as the president of Clarion University of Pennsylvania from 1937 to 1960. ==Head coaching record== ===Football=== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1889 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Basketball coaches from Kentucky Category:Kent State Golden Flashes baseball coaches Category:Kent State Golden Flashes football coaches Category:Kent State Golden Flashes men's basketball coaches Category:Kentucky Wesleyan Panthers football players Category:People from Princeton, Kentucky Category:Players of American football from Kentucky
title: Paul G. Chandler
